scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This is a black-and-white photograph (ca. 4 7/8 x 3 5/8 in.) of William Faulknerat Nagano, Japanin July-October 1955. Faulkner is seated on the floor at a Japanese dining table with a group of Japanese men.
